content.raw:
I understand now. I agree that this seems to be the simplest solution. The only issue might be if there was a more systematic change where possibly the identify task didn't use the included stuff (or "inherit") from the train task.

I'd add a comment however stating that this is necessary in case of settings being "inherited" from the previous train task.

Otherwise it looks good to me.
content.html:
I understand now. I agree that this seems to be the simplest solution. The only issue might be if there was a more systematic change where possibly the identify task didn't use the included stuff (or "inherit") from the train task.

I'd add a comment however stating that this is necessary in case of settings being "inherited" from the previous train task.

Otherwise it looks good to me.
